Text: Re R How do you delete variables from a data frame Cc PST On Mon Feb Stuart Leask wrote Is there a simple way of removing variables from a dataframe rmdataframeVAR doesnt seem to work Copying all but the unwanted variables into a new data frame is awkward when there are a lot of variables I havent found any references to this in the help files dataframeVARNULL Stuart Dr Stuart Leask MA MRCPsych Clinical Lecturer in Psychiatry University of Nottingham Dept of Psychiatry Duncan Macmillan House Porchester Road Nottingham NG AA UK psychiatrystaffsjlhtml rhelp mailing list Read hornikRRFAQhtml Send info help or unsubscribe in the body not the subject To Jens Nieschulze Institute for Forest Biometrics Phone Applied Computer Science Fax Buesgenweg Goettingen Email GERMANY jniesch rhelp mailing list Read hornikRRFAQhtml Send info help or unsubscribe in the body not the subject To
